fields.name: Dirty work:
fields.value: ** Use at any time. At the beginning of the night, become an Assassin (259) if no other Unseen are alive.

fields.name: Convert:
fields.value: Attempt to convert a player to the unseen. If they are town, they become the corresponding Unseen role. If Dubious, they remain their role but become Unseen. One day cooldown if successful, no more than 4 Unseen may be alive at once.

fields.name: Elusive (Passive):
fields.value: ** you appear as a Random Town (you know which) to all Investigation abilities until the end of night 3.
